titles.title: Providing for further consideration of the bill (H.R. 4444) to authorize extension of nondiscriminatory treatment (normal trade relations treatment) to the People's Republic of China.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-636, by Mr. Dreier.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 4444 with 3 hours of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 227.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 510.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 294 - 136 (Roll no. 225).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/23/2000--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of H.R. 4444 (authorizing extension of nondiscriminatory treatment (normal trade relations treatment) to the People's Republic of China).
